title: Keeping Watch!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>I’m home! ...Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Hello, Honoka-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Why are you in my room, Shioriko-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Sorry for surprising you. I happened to run into Umi-san while I was buying Japanese sweets at Homura, and she asked me...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Umi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. She has something to do today and can’t help you with your homework, so she wanted me to watch over you instead...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What!? Umi-chan, seriously... I mean, sorry, Shioriko-chan, you can go home. I'll be fine!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Will you actually do your homework if I leave?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uh... well... I’ll do it after a short break, yeah... Just a really quick breather, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Then please, go ahead and take a break. I’ll keep a close watch until you finish your homework.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wait, what!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
